type: Legendary Creature – Human Berserker Lord Noble
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Black Eagles[/i] – At the beginning of your combat step, exile the top card of your library. Edelgard, Flame Emperor gets +X/+X where X is that card's mana value for as long as that card remains exiled. You may play the exiled card until you exile another card with Edelgard.
[i]Crest of Seiros[/i] – Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
